summary: Backend Environment Setup, Database Configuration and Logging Setup
description: Create FastAPI services for Edge/BFF, Commerce, Ops. Configure SQLAlchemy with SQLite (commerce.db, ops.db) incl. pooling. Add Alembic per service with initial migration. Implement structured logging with rotating files, request ID middleware, health checks, and basic metrics. Implement API Gateway routing per /api/* mapping.

comments.author: Tech Lead
comments.body: Acceptance criteria clarified: /health for all services, request ID header, rotating file logs, Alembic upgrade/downgrade must run without errors.

comments.author: Florish Adekogbe
comments.body: Scaffolded Edge/BFF gateway, WebSocket hub, middleware, and downstream stubs. Added Alembic configs for Commerce and Ops.
